section.title: Saving a Session
section.para: Ardour will save your session every time you add a new track/bus, and after every capture. Saving regularly at other times will help ensure that your work is preserved on your disk drive.

section.title: Save the Session File
section.para:
Choose
Session Save
to save the changes that have been made to the session.

warning.para: Saving a session writes a new session in place of the old one, and it cannot be undone.
